dsense.name: reference
dsense.guideword: (dictionary, encyclopedia, etc.) (字典、百科全书之类)

example.eg: The scholar consulted many references, including specialized glossaries.
example.egtrans: 那位学者参考了许多资料，包括专门的术语表。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 参考的词典等，参考资料

example.eg: Ellen's reference to the previous director caused an awkward silence.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 提及, 谈到, 涉及

example.eg: The reference from the doctor led me to the specialist.
example.egtrans: 医生把我转到了专科医生那边。

example.eg: The report was filed for future reference.
example.egtrans: 此份报告已存入档案，以备他日查阅。

example.eg: We included a reference to another study.
example.egtrans: 我们加入了另一份研究作为参考。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 引文出处, 参考书目

example.egtrans: 这份报告引用了好几份参考文献。

example.eg: The scientist was a reference for the project.
example.egtrans: 该科学家是这次项目的顾问。

example.eg: The boss wrote a letter of reference.
He was asked to act as a reference for his former student.
example.egtrans: 他之前的学生请他做推荐人。

example.eg: You must correctly reference all the books you have consulted in the bibliography.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 列出...的参考资料, 在...末尾附上参考书目

example.eg: A good education provides a frame of reference that enables students to make good choices for a lifetime.
During his speech he made reference to his family.
Sales of expensive reference books have fallen now that the internet's so widely available.

dsense.name: reference letter
dsense.guideword: (statement in support of a job candidate)

example.eg: When my former assistant applied for a better job, she asked me for a reference letter.
Students must follow the university's style rules when including reference marks in their essays.
The Encyclopædia Britannica is a serious reference work.
example.egtrans: 大英百科全书是一本很严肃认真的参考书。

example.eg: The Encyclopaedia Britannica is a respected reference source.
example.egtrans: 大不列颠百科全书是倍受尊重的资料参考来源。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 资料来源, 出处, 原始资料

dsense.name: with reference to [sth], in reference to [sth]

example.eg: With reference to industry, we are hiring more workers this year.
